plot: As he sees atrocities on TV screens, paralyzed, appalled, and powerless, the Future beckons him to leave and snuff out all the racket.
title: NoMore
plot_es: As he sees atrocities on TV screens, paralyzed, appalled, and powerless, the Future beckons him to leave and snuff out all the racket.
plot_en: As he sees atrocities on TV screens, paralyzed, appalled, and powerless, the Future beckons him to leave and snuff out all the racket.
